attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This legislation makes it a criminal offense to discriminate on certain grounds, such as race, religion, and sexual "orientation," when providing goods or services.

Such laws have no place in a free society, and people have every right to decide with whom they do business.  That includes the right to refuse to deal with a person whose chosen religious beliefs or sexual perversions one finds immoral and abhorrent.
